help.nice-to-see-you: It is a pleasure to greet you
help.hello: Hello, I am here to serve you in whatever way I can
help.question: Can I help you with any of the following topics?

help.be-online: I'll be here in case something is offered to you
help.attended: It was a pleasure to help you, I'll be here if you need me
help.attended-alternative: it is a pleasure to be able to serve you
help.unknow-intent: Sorry, I do not understand what you are asking me, but I can help you with any of the following topics
